meta.title: Avalon Playa Vista - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: Avalon Playa Vista - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility Avalon Playa Vista offers apartments for lease just steps from the beach. Visit the Fisherman's Village where you can take a harbor tour or a fishing cruise, enjoy a pleasant day at the Burton W. Chase Park, stroll along the Waterfront Walk, or relax at the nearby Venice and Santa Monica beaches. Inside our community, you'll find thoughtfully designed 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartment homes that boast gourmet kitchens and private balconies or patios. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Live your life effortlessly, with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, swimming pool, and barbecue areas. This is not just apartment living. This is living up.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our apartment homes were designed with you in mind. Learn more about the different finish packages we offer at our community.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Affordable homes for rent available through the affordable housing program for qualifying future residents.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Cats and dogs are welcome. Please check the dog breed and pet restrictions. View more details

div.p: We are here for you. Let us know how we can help you find your perfect home.

There are two, controlled-access parking structures, with six levels of parking available. Residents receive either one or two parking permits, depending on the size of their apartment. Garage B is located on the left hand side of Beatrice Street. Residents park in the garage closest to their apartment.","futureResidentPolicy":"For Future Residents. Future residents may park in spaces marked, Future Resident Parking. These spaces are located on the first floor of Garage A located off of Westlawn Avenue. Follow the signs in the garage directing future residents toward the Leasing Office.","guestPolicy":"For Guests. Guests may park for free in any unreserved space, but must display a guest pass on their dashboard issued by the Leasing Office. Guests may park in either Garage A or B. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility Avalon Playa Vista offers apartments for lease just steps from the beach. Visit the Fisherman's Village where you can take a harbor tour or a fishing cruise, enjoy a pleasant day at the Burton W. Chase Park, stroll along the Waterfront Walk, or relax at the nearby Venice and Santa Monica beaches. Inside our community, you'll find thoughtfully designed 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartment homes that boast gourmet kitchens and private balconies or patios. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Live your life effortlessly, with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, swimming pool, and barbecue areas. This is not just apartment living.
